cause.description:
1 out of 20 people in the United States either has ADD/ODD/or ADHD. The people who are stuck with these diseases are rarely understood and often misjudged. Our mission is for the average person to understand better what these kids and adults have to go through in their daily life just to be recognized as a normal person. Through your help and support more and more will soon understand.
1. They have a place in the world also.
2. They didn't choose this, it was thrust upon them.
3. Give these people a chance.
cause.mission: Give People a better understanding of those with ADD/ODD/ADHD
cause.name: Understanding ADD/ODD/ADHD
